title: Companion Approval Guide
content: coins being passed along by Flo through Lann Tarv Infiltrate Moonrise Towers Requirement/s: Gain entry to Moonrise Towers Don't attack the characters n/a Karlach - Lann Tarv Moonrise Towers - Main Floor Tell Jaheira "It would be my honor" when she asks if you will take the final steps together. Infiltrate Moonrise Towers Requirement/s: Gain entry to Moonrise Towers Karlach + n/a Jaheira Moonrise Towers - Bridge Before fighting Ketheric Thorm on the rooftop, tell him: "I can help you, Ketheric-
